channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israel targets Hamas Qatar strike. And, JB Pritzker on Trump's threats to Chicago
item.description: Israel says it carried out an airstrike targeting senior Hamas officials in Qatar's capital of Doha. And, Trump says he wants to fight crime in Illino...

item.title: By listening to these birds for decades, scientists track signs of a changing forest
item.description: Scientists tracking the birds in an experimental forest in New Hampshire have also tracked changes in the forest ecosystem over decades.

item.title: California considers allowing doctors to prescribe abortion drugs anonymously
item.description: If passed, the law would protect doctors from legal risk by letting them omit their names from prescription labels for abortion pills. It would affect...

item.title: Greetings from a peaceful woodland near the River Thames west of London
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Dr. Peter Hotez takes the war against science very personally
item.description: In an interview about the new book he co-authored, Science Under Siege, Hotez talks about forces driving the anti-science movement, the risks it poses...

item.title: Risk Tolerance vs. Risk Capacity: What Levers to Pull Depending on the Situation
item.description: Real estate investing isn’t just about chasing returns. It’s about understanding how much risk you can truly handle. So let’s lay out a Risk Alignment...

item.title: How to Do a “Slow BRRRR” in 2025 (Better Than BRRRR)
item.description: The “Slow BRRRR” method. It’s less risky, comes with more cash flow, and is easier to pull off than the traditional BRRRR (buy, rehab, rent, refinance...

item.title: After selling to Spotify, Anchor’s co-founders are back with Oboe, an AI-powered app for learning
item.description: Oboe is a new AI-powered learning platform that lets you create personalized courses on any topic with a prompt.

item.title: Jaguar Land Rover says data stolen in disruptive cyberattack
item.description: The cyberattack at Jaguar Land Rover, which began on September 2, has ground vehicle assembly lines to a standstill.

item.title: Exploring the future of voice AI with Mati Staniszewski at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025

item.title: Vimeo to be acquired by Bending Spoons in $1.38B all-cash deal
item.description: The announcement comes as Bending Spoons was interested in a potential takeover of Vimeo as far back as March 2024.

item.title: How to Make Massive Returns from House Flipping in 2025

item.title: Rental Scams are on the Rise—Here’s How to Protect Yourself and Your Investments

item.title: Dutch battery startup LeydenJar’s silicon anode tech could pose a challenge to China
item.description: LeydenJar raised €13 million along with €10 million from a U.S. consumer electronics company to scale production of its silicon anode material.

item.title: From slavery to pollution, National Park employees flagged material deemed ‘disparaging’ to US
Plans in the works for Korean workers detained in raid to go home while fear lingers for residents
Man faces federal charge in killing of Ukrainian woman on Charlotte train
item.description: The Justice Department has charged a man with the fatal stabbing of a Ukrainian refugee on a North Carolina commuter train.
